ISSUE.TITLE: [Bug] - Cell is not updating after clearing cell value using delete key
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The cell value is not syncing with server data after clearing the cell value using <kbd>delete</kbd> key.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: save record on enter/shift-enter key press closes #1002 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: update cell value after claering cell using delete key closes #1005 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>
